sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_0d653085c33baa106b28bb459901318b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>true</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_blame_ext_script_table</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Hardcoded GlideRecord + LegacyClassOne</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[// BR 2: Hardcoded GlideRecord + LegacyClassOne static method
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
    // GlideRecord with hardcoded table name
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
    gr.addQuery('active', true);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        gs.info('Active user: ' + gr.name);
    }

    // LegacyClassOne static call
    LegacyClassOne.doSomethingStatic();
})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-03 13:12:38</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>0d653085c33baa106b28bb459901318b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Hardcoded GlideRecord + LegacyClassOne</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="SN Blame Extension" source="x_blame_ext">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SN Blame Extension">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_0d653085c33baa106b28bb459901318b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-03 13:12:38</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0d653085c33baa106b28bb459901318b"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_3c633041c33baa106b28bb459901316a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_blame_ext.LegacyClassThree</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>LegacyClassThree</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[// Script Include: LegacyClassThree
var LegacyClassThree = Class.create();
LegacyClassThree.TASK_TABLE = 'sc_task';
LegacyClassThree.DEFAULT_VALUE = 99;

LegacyClassThree.prototype = Object.extendsObject(LegacyClassTwo, {
    initialize: function() {
        this.value = LegacyClassThree.DEFAULT_VALUE;
    },
	
    getTasks: function() {
        var gr = new GlideRecord(LegacyClassThree.TASK_TABLE);
        gr.query();
        while (gr.next()) {
            gs.info('Task: ' + gr.number);
        }
    },

    nestedLookup: function() {
        var task = new GlideRecord(LegacyClassThree.TASK_TABLE);
        task.query();
        while (task.next()) {
            var usr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
            usr.addQuery('sys_id', task.assigned_to);
            usr.query();
            while (usr.next()) {
                gs.info('Task ' + task.number + ' assigned to ' + usr.name);
            }
        }
    },

    type: 'LegacyClassThree'
});

LegacyClassThree.multiplyValue = function(val) {
    return val * 3;
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-03 13:07:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>3c633041c33baa106b28bb459901316a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>LegacyClassThree</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SN Blame Extension" source="x_blame_ext">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="SN Blame Extension">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3c633041c33baa106b28bb459901316a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-03 13:07:09</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_dce4f805c33baa106b28bb4599013167
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_blame_ext_script_table</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Call ModernClassOne & LegacyClassOne</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[// BR 1: Call ModernClassOne static + nested GlideRecord + LegacyClassOne static
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
    // Call ModernClassOne static method
    ModernClassOne.doSomethingStatic();

    // Use nested GlideRecord via class method
    var mc1 = new ModernClassOne();
    mc1.nestedGlideRecordExample();

	LegacyClassOne.doSomethingStatic();
})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-03 13:11:47</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>dce4f805c33baa106b28bb4599013167</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Call ModernClassOne & LegacyClassOne</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="SN Blame Extension" source="x_blame_ext">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SN Blame Extension">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_dce4f805c33baa106b28bb4599013167</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-03 13:12:17</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=dce4f805c33baa106b28bb4599013167"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_c1433c01c33baa106b28bb45990131a0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_blame_ext.LegacyClassTwo</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>LegacyClassTwo</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[// Script Include: LegacyClassTwo
var LegacyClassTwo = Class.create();
LegacyClassTwo.TABLE = 'change_request';
LegacyClassTwo.VERSION = '2.0.0';

LegacyClassTwo.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
        this.id = gs.generateGUID();
    },

    getChanges: function() {
        var gr = new GlideRecord(LegacyClassTwo.TABLE);
        gr.query();
        while (gr.next()) {
            gs.info('Change: ' + gr.number);
        }
    },

    nestedChanges: function() {
        var change = new GlideRecord(LegacyClassTwo.TABLE);
        change.query();
        while (change.next()) {
            var task = new GlideRecord('change_task');
            task.addQuery('change_request', change.sys_id);
            task.query();
            while (task.next()) {
                gs.info('Task ' + task.number + ' for Change ' + change.number);
            }
        }
    },

    type: 'LegacyClassTwo'
};

LegacyClassTwo.getVersion = function() {
    return LegacyClassTwo.VERSION;
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-03 13:03:32</sys_created_on><sys_id>c1433c01c33baa106b28bb45990131a0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>LegacyClassTwo</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SN Blame Extension" source="x_blame_ext">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="SN Blame Extension">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_c1433c01c33baa106b28bb45990131a0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-03 13:03:32</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_2232fc8dc3f7aa106b28bb459901314a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_blame_ext.ModernClassOne</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>ModernClassOne</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[// Script Include: ModernClassOne
var ModernClassOne = class ModernClassOne {
    static TABLE_NAME = 'incident';
    static CONSTANT_ONE = 'CONST_1';

    constructor() {
        this.name = 'ModernClassOne';
    }

    static doSomethingStatic() {
        gs.info('ModernClassOne static method called');
        const gr = new GlideRecord(ModernClassOne.TABLE_NAME);
        gr.query();
        while (gr.next()) {
            gs.info('Found: ' + gr.number);
        }
    }

    doSomething() {
        gs.info('ModernClassOne instance method called');
        const gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        gr.query();
        while (gr.next()) {
            gs.info('User: ' + gr.name);
        }
    }

    nestedGlideRecordExample() {
        const inc = new GlideRecord(ModernClassOne.TABLE_NAME);
        inc.query();
        while (inc.next()) {
            const usr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
            usr.addQuery('sys_id', inc.caller_id);
            usr.query();
            while (usr.next()) {
                gs.info(`Incident ${inc.number} belongs to ${usr.name}`);
            }
        }
    }
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-03 12:59:13</sys_created_on><sys_id>2232fc8dc3f7aa106b28bb459901314a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ModernClassOne</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SN Blame Extension" source="x_blame_ext">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="SN Blame Extension">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2232fc8dc3f7aa106b28bb459901314a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-03 12:59:13</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="ua_table_licensing_config"><ua_table_licensing_config action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><is_fulfillment>false</is_fulfillment><license_condition/><license_model>none</license_model><license_roles/><name>x_blame_ext_script_table</name><op_delete>true</op_delete><op_insert>true</op_insert><op_update>true</op_update><owner_condition/><sys_class_name>ua_table_licensing_config</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-03 12:51:48</sys_created_on><sys_id>3b90b00dc3f7aa106b28bb45990131c3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_blame_ext_script_table</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SN Blame Extension" source="x_blame_ext">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SN Blame Extension">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>ua_table_licensing_config_3b90b00dc3f7aa106b28bb45990131c3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-03 12:51:48</sys_updated_on></ua_table_licensing_config></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_89757085c33baa106b28bb45990131ef
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>true</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_blame_ext_script_table</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>ModernClassTwo constant table</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[// BR 3: Use ModernClassTwo constant table
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
    var mc2 = new ModernClassTwo();
    mc2.getChangeRequests();

    // GlideRecord with constant table
    var gr = new GlideRecord(ModernClassTwo.TABLE);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        gs.info('Found change: ' + gr.number);
    }
})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-03 13:12:54</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>89757085c33baa106b28bb45990131ef</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ModernClassTwo constant table</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="SN Blame Extension" source="x_blame_ext">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SN Blame Extension">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_89757085c33baa106b28bb45990131ef</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-03 13:12:54</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=89757085c33baa106b28bb45990131ef"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_0d333c01c33baa106b28bb4599013137
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_blame_ext.LegacyClassOne</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>LegacyClassOne</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[// Script Include: LegacyClassOne
var LegacyClassOne = Class.create();
LegacyClassOne.TABLE = 'incident';
LegacyClassOne.CONSTANT_ONE = 'CONST_A';

LegacyClassOne.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
        this.name = 'LegacyClassOne';
    },

    doSomething: function() {
        gs.info('LegacyClassOne instance method called');
        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        gr.query();
        while (gr.next()) {
            gs.info('User: ' + gr.name);
        }
    },

    nestedExample: function() {
        var inc = new GlideRecord(LegacyClassOne.TABLE);
        inc.query();
        while (inc.next()) {
            var usr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
            usr.addQuery('sys_id', inc.caller_id);
            usr.query();
            while (usr.next()) {
                gs.info('Incident ' + inc.number + ' by ' + usr.name);
            }
        }
    },

    type: 'LegacyClassOne'
};

LegacyClassOne.doSomethingStatic = function() {
    gs.info('LegacyClassOne static method called');
    var gr = new GlideRecord(LegacyClassOne.TABLE);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        gs.info('Incident: ' + gr.number);
    }
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-03 13:03:18</sys_created_on><sys_id>0d333c01c33baa106b28bb4599013137</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>LegacyClassOne</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SN Blame Extension" source="x_blame_ext">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="SN Blame Extension">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0d333c01c33baa106b28bb4599013137</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-03 13:03:18</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_blame_ext_script_table</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>ModernClassThree static</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[// BR 5: ModernClassThree static and nested queries
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
    var mc3 = new ModernClassThree();
    mc3.getTasks();
    mc3.nestedUserLookup();

    var doubled = ModernClassThree.multiplyValue(10);
    gs.info('Double 10: ' + doubled);
})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-03 13:13:41</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>64a5f485c33baa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ModernClassThree static</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="SN Blame Extension" source="x_blame_ext">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SN Blame Extension">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_64a5f485c33baa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-03 13:13:41</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=64a5f485c33baa106b28bb45990131d0"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_documentation element="script" label="Script" language="en" table="x_blame_ext_script_table"><sys_documentation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><element>script</element><help/><hint/><label>Script</label><language>en</language><name>x_blame_ext_script_table</name><plural>Scripts</plural><sys_class_name>sys_documentation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-03 12:51:47</sys_created_on><sys_id>ff90b00dc3f7aa106b28bb45990131ad</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Script</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SN Blame Extension" source="x_blame_ext">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SN Blame Extension">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_documentation_x_blame_ext_script_table_script_en</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-03 12:51:47</sys_updated_on><url/><url_target/></sys_documentation></sys_documentation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_4d23b801c33baa106b28bb45990131fc
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_blame_ext.ModernClassTwo</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>ModernClassTwo</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[// Script Include: ModernClassTwo
var ModernClassTwo = class ModernClassTwo {
    static TABLE = 'change_request';
    static VERSION = '1.0.0';

    constructor() {
        this.id = gs.generateGUID();
    }

    static getVersion() {
        return ModernClassTwo.VERSION;
    }

    getChangeRequests() {
        const gr = new GlideRecord(ModernClassTwo.TABLE);
        gr.query();
        while (gr.next()) {
            gs.info('Change: ' + gr.number);
        }
    }

    nestedExample() {
        const change = new GlideRecord(ModernClassTwo.TABLE);
        change.query();
        while (change.next()) {
            const task = new GlideRecord('change_task');
            task.addQuery('change_request', change.sys_id);
            task.query();
            while (task.next()) {
                gs.info(`Task ${task.number} for Change ${change.number}`);
            }
        }
    }
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-03 13:03:02</sys_created_on><sys_id>4d23b801c33baa106b28bb45990131fc</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ModernClassTwo</sys_name><sys_package display_value="SN Blame Extension" source="x_blame_ext">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="SN Blame Extension">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_4d23b801c33baa106b28bb45990131fc</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-03 13:03:02</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_3a857485c33baa106b28bb45990131e2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_blame_ext_script_table</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>LegacyClassTwo nested GlideRecord</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[// BR 4: LegacyClassTwo nested GlideRecord
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
    var lc2 = new LegacyClassTwo();
    lc2.nestedChanges();

    // Static call
    gs.info('LegacyClassTwo version: ' + LegacyClassTwo.getVersion());
})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-03 13:13:17</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3a857485c33baa106b28bb45990131e2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>LegacyClassTwo nested GlideRecord</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="SN Blame Extension" source="x_blame_ext">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SN Blame Extension">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_3a857485c33baa106b28bb45990131e2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-03 13:13:17</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=3a857485c33baa106b28bb45990131e2"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_3fd23ccdc3f7aa106b28bb459901314a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_blame_ext.ModernClassThree </api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>ModernClassThree </name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[// Script Include: ModernClassThree
var ModernClassThree = class ModernClassThree extends ModernClassOne{
    static DEFAULT_VALUE = 42;
    static TASK_TABLE = 'sc_task';

    constructor() {
		super();
        this.value = ModernClassThree.DEFAULT_VALUE;
    }

    static multiplyValue(val) {
        return val * 2;
    }

    incrementValue() {
        this.value++;
        return this.value;
    }

    getTasks() {
        const taskGr = new GlideRecord(ModernClassThree.TASK_TABLE);
        taskGr.query();
        while (taskGr.next()) {
            gs.info(`Task: ${taskGr.number}`);
        }
    }

    nestedUserLookup() {
        const task = new GlideRecord(ModernClassThree.TASK_TABLE);
        task.query();
        while (task.next()) {
            const usr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
            usr.addQuery('sys_id', task.assigned_to);
            usr.query();
            while (usr.next()) {
                gs.info(`Task ${task.number} is assigned to ${usr.name}`);
            }
        }
    }
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-03 13:02:01</sys_created_on><sys_id>3fd23ccdc3f7aa106b28bb459901314a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ModernClassThree </sys_name><sys_package display_value="SN Blame Extension" source="x_blame_ext">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="SN Blame Extension">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_3fd23ccdc3f7aa106b28bb459901314a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-03 13:04:53</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_e4b53c85c33baa106b28bb4599013101
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>true</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>x_blame_ext_script_table</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name> LegacyClassThree static + hardcoded GR</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[// BR 6: LegacyClassThree static + hardcoded GlideRecord
(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
    // Hardcoded GlideRecord
    var gr = new GlideRecord('incident');
    gr.addQuery('priority', 1);
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        gs.info('High priority incident: ' + gr.number);
    }

    // LegacyClassThree static call
    var tripled = LegacyClassThree.multiplyValue(5);
    gs.info('Triple 5: ' + tripled);

    // Instance method
    var lc3 = new LegacyClassThree();
    lc3.nestedLookup();
})(current, previous);
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-09-03 13:13:58</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e4b53c85c33baa106b28bb4599013101</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name> LegacyClassThree static + hardcoded GR</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="SN Blame Extension" source="x_blame_ext">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="SN Blame Extension">9dbfe009c3f7aa106b28bb45990131d0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_e4b53c85c33baa106b28bb4599013101</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-09-03 13:13:58</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=e4b53c85c33baa106b28bb4599013101"/></record_update>
